txt.en: 'The grim state of our land is evident in the face of every man, woman, and child. Elthengels remains standing, despite the casualties lost in the raid against it. The crofters who worked the fields to the west have been slain by the passing armies, or have fled behind the walls of the town to seek shelter. We can only defend for so long, and the desperate have already begun fleeing towards Edoras.'
What is the state of Elthengels?
